alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 9:05PM EST until March 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Riverton. Wabash River at Montezuma. Wabash River at Covington. Wabash River at Lafayette. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Terre Haute. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. Wabash River at Clinton. .Rainfall amounts of one and one and a half to over three inches earlier last week brought lowland flooding to the Wabash River. With more rain in the forecast over the next few days, these conditions could persist into the middle of next week or longer in some locations. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Covington. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, A few county roads begin to flood. Higher bottomlands begin to flood. The first cottage upstream from U.S. 136 bridge may become isolated by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 19.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EST Sunday was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.3 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
